name: Asteroid shooter (Mr Hermit)
description:
This game is a type of scroll shooter that has both 3D and 2D perspective for the player to choose from.

Controls

Shooting
- Right mouse click

Movement
- W = Forward
- A = Tilt left
- S = Backwards
- D = Tilt right

Switch screen
- Q = 2D
- E = 3D

Restart
- After all asteroids have stopped spawning you will be about to press R to restart. You will also restart the game when switching between 2D and 3D,
